typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Account as (Id as string, Name as string, Type as string, ParentId as string, Website as string, Industry as string, AnnualRevenue as double, NumberOfEmployees as integer, CurrencyIsoCode as string, OwnerId as string, CreatedDate as string, LastModifiedDate as string, LastActivityDate as string, Opportunity_Count__c as double, Classification_AnnualRev_Range__c as string, Key_Accounts__c as boolean, Classification_EmployeesRange__c as string, Partner_Level__c as string, Has_Altify_Account__c as double, Date_of_First_Contact__c as string, SAG_Organization__c as string, Industry_Sub__c as string, Address_Visit_Country__c as string, Address_Visit_State__c as string, Classification_PersonalPriority__c as string, Type_Sub__c as string, KeyWords__c as string, Account_ID_with_18_Char__c as string, Classification_Status__c as string, Board_Responsible__c as string, Division__c as string, Cluster__c as string, Sales_Region__c as string, Sales_Sub_Region__c as string, Domestic_Ultimate_DUNS_Number__c as string, Global_Ultimate_DUNS_Number__c as string, Go_To_Market_Segmentation__c as string, DUNS_Number__c as string, Account_Owner_Role__c as string, Website_Domain__c as string, Customer_Classification__c as string, accountIntentScore6sense_IoT__c as double, accountProfileFit6sense_IoT__c as string, accountBuyingStage6sense_IoT__c as string, DNBoptimizer__DNB_D_U_N_S_Number__c as string, DNBoptimizer__DnBCompanyRecord__c as string, Opportunity_Bookings_Open__c as double, Opportunity_Count_Open__c as double, SAP_Contract_Count_Active__c as double, SAP_Contract_Count__c as double, Parent_Account_Account_Id_18__c as string, accountBuyingStage6sense_INT__c as string, accountIntentScore6sense_INT__c as double, accountProfileFit6sense_INT__c as string, accountReachScore6sense_INT__c as string, accountReachScore6sense_IoT__c as string, A2_Likely_to_Convert__c as string, A_N_Likely_to_Convert__c as string, Integration_Likely_To_Convert__c as string, IoT_Likely_to_Convert__c as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'IngestionDate',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SalesforceAccountsFromBlob
SalesforceAccountsFromBlob foldDown(unroll(Account),
	mapColumn(
		Account_ID_with_18_Char__c = Account.Account_ID_with_18_Char__c,
		Account_Owner_Role__c = Account.Account_Owner_Role__c,
		Address_Visit_Country__c = Account.Address_Visit_Country__c,
		Address_Visit_State__c = Account.Address_Visit_State__c,
		AnnualRevenue = Account.AnnualRevenue,
		Board_Responsible__c = Account.Board_Responsible__c,
		Classification_AnnualRev_Range__c = Account.Classification_AnnualRev_Range__c,
		Classification_EmployeesRange__c = Account.Classification_EmployeesRange__c,
		Classification_PersonalPriority__c = Account.Classification_PersonalPriority__c,
		Classification_Status__c = Account.Classification_Status__c,
		Cluster__c = Account.Cluster__c,
		CreatedDate = Account.CreatedDate,
		CurrencyIsoCode = Account.CurrencyIsoCode,
		Customer_Classification__c = Account.Customer_Classification__c,
		DNBoptimizer__DNB_D_U_N_S_Number__c = Account.DNBoptimizer__DNB_D_U_N_S_Number__c,
		DNBoptimizer__DnBCompanyRecord__c = Account.DNBoptimizer__DnBCompanyRecord__c,
		DUNS_Number__c = Account.DUNS_Number__c,
		Date_of_First_Contact__c = Account.Date_of_First_Contact__c,
		Division__c = Account.Division__c,
		Domestic_Ultimate_DUNS_Number__c = Account.Domestic_Ultimate_DUNS_Number__c,
		Global_Ultimate_DUNS_Number__c = Account.Global_Ultimate_DUNS_Number__c,
		Go_To_Market_Segmentation__c = Account.Go_To_Market_Segmentation__c,
		Has_Altify_Account__c = Account.Has_Altify_Account__c,
		Id = Account.Id,
		Industry = Account.Industry,
		Industry_Sub__c = Account.Industry_Sub__c,
		KeyWords__c = Account.KeyWords__c,
		Key_Accounts__c = Account.Key_Accounts__c,
		LastActivityDate = Account.LastActivityDate,
		LastModifiedDate = Account.LastModifiedDate,
		Name = Account.Name,
		NumberOfEmployees = Account.NumberOfEmployees,
		Opportunity_Bookings_Open__c = Account.Opportunity_Bookings_Open__c,
		Opportunity_Count_Open__c = Account.Opportunity_Count_Open__c,
		Opportunity_Count__c = Account.Opportunity_Count__c,
		OwnerId = Account.OwnerId,
		ParentId = Account.ParentId,
		Parent_Account_Account_Id_18__c = Account.Parent_Account_Account_Id_18__c,
		Partner_Level__c = Account.Partner_Level__c,
		SAG_Organization__c = Account.SAG_Organization__c,
		SAP_Contract_Count_Active__c = Account.SAP_Contract_Count_Active__c,
		SAP_Contract_Count__c = Account.SAP_Contract_Count__c,
		Sales_Region__c = Account.Sales_Region__c,
		Sales_Sub_Region__c = Account.Sales_Sub_Region__c,
		Type = Account.Type,
		Type_Sub__c = Account.Type_Sub__c,
		Website = Account.Website,
		Website_Domain__c = Account.Website_Domain__c,
		accountBuyingStage6sense_INT__c = Account.accountBuyingStage6sense_INT__c,
		accountBuyingStage6sense_IoT__c = Account.accountBuyingStage6sense_IoT__c,
		accountIntentScore6sense_INT__c = Account.accountIntentScore6sense_INT__c,
		accountIntentScore6sense_IoT__c = Account.accountIntentScore6sense_IoT__c,
		accountProfileFit6sense_INT__c = Account.accountProfileFit6sense_INT__c,
		accountProfileFit6sense_IoT__c = Account.accountProfileFit6sense_IoT__c,
		accountReachScore6sense_INT__c = Account.accountReachScore6sense_INT__c,
		accountReachScore6sense_IoT__c = Account.accountReachScore6sense_IoT__c,
		IngestionDate,
		A_N_Likely_to_Convert__c = Account.A_N_Likely_to_Convert__c,
		Integration_Likely_To_Convert__c = Account.Integration_Likely_To_Convert__c,
		A2_Likely_to_Convert__c = Account.A2_Likely_to_Convert__c,
		IoT_Likely_to_Convert__c = Account.IoT_Likely_to_Convert__c
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> JsonToTabularFormat
JsonToTabularFormat filter(not(isNull(Id))) ~> RemoveNullValuesFromId
RemoveNullValuesFromId derive(IngestionDate = toDate(split(split(IngestionDate, '/')[6],'_')[1]),
		CreatedDate = toDate(CreatedDate),
		LastModifiedDate = toDate(LastModifiedDate)) ~> ConvertDatesFromStringToDate
ConvertDatesFromStringToDate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Account_ID_with_18_Char__c as string,
		Account_Owner_Role__c as string,
		Address_Visit_Country__c as string,
		Address_Visit_State__c as string,
		AnnualRevenue as double,
		Board_Responsible__c as string,
		Classification_AnnualRev_Range__c as string,
		Classification_EmployeesRange__c as string,
		Classification_PersonalPriority__c as string,
		Classification_Status__c as string,
		Cluster__c as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		CurrencyIsoCode as string,
		Customer_Classification__c as integer,
		DNBoptimizer__DNB_D_U_N_S_Number__c as string,
		DNBoptimizer__DnBCompanyRecord__c as string,
		DUNS_Number__c as string,
		Date_of_First_Contact__c as date,
		Division__c as string,
		Domestic_Ultimate_DUNS_Number__c as string,
		Global_Ultimate_DUNS_Number__c as string,
		Go_To_Market_Segmentation__c as string,
		Has_Altify_Account__c as double,
		Id as string,
		Industry as string,
		Industry_Sub__c as string,
		KeyWords__c as string,
		Key_Accounts__c as boolean,
		LastActivityDate as date,
		LastModifiedDate as date,
		Name as string,
		NumberOfEmployees as integer,
		Opportunity_Bookings_Open__c as double,
		Opportunity_Count_Open__c as double,
		Opportunity_Count__c as double,
		OwnerId as string,
		ParentId as string,
		Parent_Account_Account_Id_18__c as string,
		Partner_Level__c as string,
		SAG_Organization__c as string,
		SAP_Contract_Count_Active__c as double,
		SAP_Contract_Count__c as double,
		Sales_Region__c as string,
		Sales_Sub_Region__c as string,
		Type as string,
		Type_Sub__c as string,
		Website as string,
		Website_Domain__c as string,
		accountBuyingStage6sense_INT__c as string,
		accountBuyingStage6sense_IoT__c as string,
		accountIntentScore6sense_INT__c as double,
		accountIntentScore6sense_IoT__c as double,
		accountProfileFit6sense_INT__c as string,
		accountProfileFit6sense_IoT__c as string,
		accountReachScore6sense_INT__c as string,
		accountReachScore6sense_IoT__c as string,
		IngestionDate as date,
		A_N_Likely_to_Convert__c as string,
		Integration_Likely_To_Convert__c as string,
		A2_Likely_to_Convert__c as string,
		IoT_Likely_to_Convert__c as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> StoreToDatabase
